sources.title: The Ballad of Andy Crocker (1969)
sources.description: Returning Vietnam veteran Andy Crocker arrives in his small hometown to discover his best friend and business partner has mismanaged their business into bankruptcy and his high school sweetheart has married another man. It is evident his small town has little to offer him except the hard-working life of his father, while the broader world has limited opportunities for a man who left school after the third grade. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-ballad-of-andy-crocker-1969/

metadata.Plot: A returning Vietnam veteran finds out that his girlfriend has been forced into marrying someone else, his small business is in ruins and friends are in short supply.
metadata.Actors: Lee Majors, Joey Heatherton, Jimmy Dean
